channel.title: CVE Feed for KIE -- jbpm-designer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KIE -- jbpm-designer

item.title: CVE-2017-7545|2024-08-05T16:04:11.884Z -- kie -- jbpm-designer
item.description: It was discovered that the XmlUtils class in jbpmmigration 6.5 performed expansion of external parameter entities while parsing XML files. A remote attacker could use this flaw to read files accessible to the user running the application server and, potentially, perform other more advanced XML eXternal Entity (XXE) attacks.
